verse: Whatever you do, work at it with all your heart, as working for the Lord. - Colossians 3:23

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts. - Winston Churchill
verse: For though the righteous fall seven times, they rise again. - Proverbs 24:16

quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been. - George Eliot
verse: For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future. - Jeremiah 29:11

quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world. - Mahatma Gandhi
verse: Let your light shine before others, that they may see your good deeds and glorify your Father in heaven. - Matthew 5:16

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams. - Eleanor Roosevelt
verse: Delight yourself in the Lord, and He will give you the desires of your heart. - Psalm 37:4

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there. - Theodore Roosevelt
verse: I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me. - Philippians 4:13

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it. - Abraham Lincoln
verse: Commit to the Lord whatever you do, and He will establish your plans. - Proverbs 16:3

quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment. - Buddha
verse: Therefore do not worry about tomorrow, for tomorrow will worry about itself. - Matthew 6:34

quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become. - Buddha
verse: As a man thinks in his heart, so is he. - Proverbs 23:7

quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on. - Robert Frost
verse: To everything there is a season, and a time to every purpose under heaven. - Ecclesiastes 3:1

quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world. - Roy T. Bennett
verse: Each of you should use whatever gift you have received to serve others. - 1 Peter 4:10

quote: You can't go back and change the beginning, but you can start where you are and change the ending. - C.S. Lewis
verse: Forget the former things; do not dwell on the past. See, I am doing a new thing! - Isaiah 43:18-19

quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life. - Steve Jobs
verse: Teach us to number our days, that we may gain a heart of wisdom. - Psalm 90:12

quote: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want. - Psalm 23:1
verse: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want. - Psalm 23:1

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today. - Franklin D. Roosevelt
verse: If you can believe, all things are possible to him who believes. - Mark 9:23

quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary. - Vidal Sassoon
verse: Lazy hands make for poverty, but diligent hands bring wealth. - Proverbs 10:4

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream. - C.S. Lewis
verse: Even to your old age and gray hairs I am He, I am He who will sustain you. - Isaiah 46:4

quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny. - C.S. Lewis
verse: We also glory in our sufferings, because we know that suffering produces perseverance. - Romans 5:3

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take. - Wayne Gretzky
verse: Ask and it will be given to you; seek and you will find. - Matthew 7:7

quote: There are no shortcuts to any place worth going. - Beverly Sills
verse: The path of the righteous is like the morning sun, shining ever brighter till the full light of day. - Proverbs 4:18

quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans. - John Lennon
verse: In their hearts humans plan their course, but the Lord establishes their steps. - Proverbs 16:9

quote: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity. - Albert Einstein
verse: And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love Him. - Romans 8:28

quote: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it. - Charles R. Swindoll
verse: A cheerful heart is good medicine, but a crushed spirit dries up the bones. - Proverbs 17:22

quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment. - Ralph Waldo Emerson
verse: For you created my inmost being; you knit me together in my mother’s womb. - Psalm 139:13

quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself. - Franklin D. Roosevelt
verse: For God has not given us a spirit of fear, but of power and of love and of a sound mind. - 2 Timothy 1:7

verse: Each of you should use whatever gift you have received to serve others. - 1 Peter 4:10

verse: Let us not become weary in doing good, for at the proper time we will reap a harvest if we do not give up. - Galatians 6:9
